name: Air-Gapped Deployment
description: Deploy Beton in fully isolated environments with no external network access. Ideal for regulated industries.

name: Access Controls (RBAC)
description: Role-based access controls for teams. Define who can view, edit, and manage signals, integrations, and routing rules.

name: White-Glove Onboarding
description: Dedicated onboarding support including PostHog setup review, signal configuration, CRM integration, and team training.
